price: E fazemos descer do céu água bendita, e, com ela fazemos germinar jardins e grãos de ceifar,
arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wanazzalnā mina al-samāi māan mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabba al-ḥaṣīdi
